add_subdirectory(glad)
set_target_properties(glad PROPERTIES FOLDER Extern)
add_subdirectory(glm)
set_target_properties(glm PROPERTIES FOLDER Extern)
add_subdirectory(imgui)
set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES FOLDER Extern)
add_subdirectory(stb_image)
set_target_properties(stb_image PROPERTIES FOLDER Extern)
add_subdirectory(tiny_obj_loader)
set_target_properties(tiny_obj_loader PROPERTIES FOLDER Extern)
